ValidationRule.description: Date of Treatment 4 or Month of Treatment 4 must be entered
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK( Date_Treated_4__c ), ISBLANK( Treatment_4_MM_YYYY_If_No_Exact_Date__c ), Not( ISBLANK( Physician_Name_4__c )), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Short_Term_Disability" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: CL-035 Either Date Treated #4 or Treatment#4 MM/YYYY must be entered
